hartford.neighborhoods: Downtown, Frog Hollow, Asylum Hill, West End, Parkville, South Green
hartford.meetingHighlights: Active downtown and university-area meetings with strong community engagement; several speaker and traditions-study meetings weekly.
hartford.transitInfo: CTtransit buses and local shuttles serve Hartford; Bradley International Airport (BDL) is north of the city for regional flights.

new-haven.neighborhoods: Downtown, Westville, East Rock, The Hill
new-haven.meetingHighlights: Strong campus and community meetings near Yale and downtown; many daytime and evening groups including study and speaker formats.
new-haven.transitInfo: CTtransit buses and Shore Line East connect New Haven to the region; Tweed New Haven Airport (HVN) serves limited flights.

norwalk.meetingHighlights: Active meetings in South Norwalk and surrounding neighborhoods; convenient commuter access to NYC-area meetings.
norwalk.transitInfo: Norwalk Transit District and Metro-North rail provide commuter connections; Westchester County and Newark airports accessible for travel.

bridgeport.neighborhoods: Downtown, East End, Black Rock, North End, South End
bridgeport.meetingHighlights: Largest city in Connecticut with diverse recovery community; Spanish and English meetings; strong tradition of service.
bridgeport.transitInfo: Metro-North Railroad and CT Transit buses; Sikorsky Memorial Airport (BDR); I-95 corridor.

stamford.neighborhoods: Downtown Stamford, Glenbrook, Springdale, Shippan, North Stamford
stamford.meetingHighlights: Corporate city recovery with early morning and lunchtime meetings; diverse downtown presence; commuter-friendly schedule.
stamford.transitInfo: Metro-North Railroad hub with frequent NYC service; CT Transit buses; I-95 access.
